summary: The 'Instituting Notification Formalities On Reorganizing Mail Act of 2025' (INFORM Act of 2025) requires the United States Postal Service (USPS) to post notices of changes affecting nationwide postal services. The bill amends Title 39, United States Code, Section 3661, mandating the USPS to submit proposed changes to the Postal Regulatory Commission, post notices in postal facilities, and include details about the change, timelines, impacts, public comment opportunities, and contact information.
